attributes.action: Ban mobile phones that permit music to be played through the 'loudspeaker'
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 'Ghetto blaster' culture is re-emerging in the form of the mobile phone. I'm tired of people walking past me in the street damaging my ears with their anti social music when head phones not only would be of a better sound quality to the phone owner but also save my ears! Please influence mobile phone companies to disable the music through the 'loudspeaker' facility.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
